title: Big Buck Bunny
description: Three rodents amuse themselves by harassing creatures of the forest. However, when they target a gentle giant bunny, he decides to get even in the most hilarious way.

title: Sintel
description: A lonely young woman, Sintel, helps and befriends a dragon, whom she calls Scales.

title: Tears of Steel
description: In an apocalyptic future, a group of soldiers and scientists takes refuge in Amsterdam to stage a crucial experiment that could restore mankind.

title: Elephantâ€™s Dream
description: Friends Proog and Emo journey inside the folds of a seemingly infinite Machine, exploring a world of imagination and logic.
